Question.Subject: Why was my sporedum.net account suspended for no apparent reason?
Question.Content: I made an account only a week ago, making only 2 posts about saying something random and a comment on a mod saying that it wasn't working. I go to check if someone answered the comment, but it showed a page saying "Account Suspended; This Account Has Been Suspended." Why did this happen? This makes no sense.
Question.ChosenAnswer: The actual website itself was suspended from the service used to create it. That's all that's known at this time.

Answer.Content: The actual website itself was suspended from the service used to create it. That's all that's known at this time.
